subject: Re: [junit] detect test failure in teardown()
msgSnippet: ... Yes: look at the stack trace. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods
messageBody:
Bill Oliver wrote:

> Is there an easy way to determine if a test failed / erred during the
> teardown() method?

Yes: look at the stack trace.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
